Title: Working Ladies Open Face Pocket Watch Arnex Time Co. Inc. 17 Jewel  France Nice
Description: Arnex Pocket Watch, Woman's Open Face, 17 Jewel In Cabloc, Works Great France Up for sale is a vintage, pre owned, women's Arnex, open face pocket watch. It is in very good condition, and keeps time. It has a roman numeral dial with the fancy hands. The case is very finely engraved with a floral pattern on the back, sides, front edges. There is a tiny maker's mark stamped on the outside of the case directly opposite of the winding stem. These were designed to hang on a chain or act as a fob. The case could use a cleaning but is still a beauty as it is. This is part of my personal collection. Sold as is. Please email with any questions before bidding.
